column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We've been here multiple times with friends or on dates
column2: and haven't been disappointed yet! Everything we've gotten has been delicious
column3: and Jinya has won friends who've never had or liked ramen over. The noodles are tasty and extremely well cooked. My favorite is the Spicy Chicken Ramen
column4: and the Tonkotsu Black and Cha Cha Cha (among others) are good options as well. I also enjoy the Takopachi
column5: which is hard to come by in Houston as far as I know. The "combinations" are just okay - the Tokyo Curry Rice tasted average.
